Hussein Mohamed Shafiq (Arabic, nke a na-akpọkarị Hussein Riad (Arabic) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri,  na-eme "ọrụ nna"
Ọrụ ya were ihe dịka afọ 46 ma gosipụta ihe dịka ihe nkiri 320, ihe nkiri ihe nkiri 240, na redio 150 na ihe nkiri TV 50.
A mụrụ Riad "Hussein Mohamed Shafiq" (Arabic) n'afọ 1897 na mpaghara Al-Sayeda Zaynab nke Cairo, Egypt, nye nna Egypt na nne Siria
O mechara gbanwee aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Hussein Riad
Nwanne ya nwoke nọkwa na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe Mohamed Fouad (nke a maara site na aha egwu ya bụ Fouad Shafiq)
N'afọ 1916, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ iji malite ime ihe nkiri wee sonye na Arab Acting Institute.
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1923, Riad so Youssef Wahbi's Theatrical Troupe na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri rụọ ọrụ
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, n'afọ 1926, Riad malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri na-adịghị ekwu okwu

N'oge ọrụ ya, a maara Riad dịka "nna nke ịhụnanya" n'ọtụtụ ọrụ ya ma sonye n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri a ma ama na ihe nkiri Egypt, dịka Back Again, Jamila, the Algerian, Among the Ruins, Divine Love, Forbidden Women, Dearer than My Life na Saladin.
N'afọ 1963, ọ natara ihe nrite nke steeti Egypt na ihe nrite sayensị na nka.
Riad nwụrụ na n'abalị 17 nke ọnwa July, afọ 1965, site na nkụchi obi
N'afọ 2019, nwa ya nwanyị, Fatima, bipụtara akwụkwọ banyere ndụ ya, ọrụ ime ihe nkiri na ọnwụ ya, ma nyefee ya ndị na-akwado ya niile.
